Boost Utility Library

The Boost Utility Library isn't really a single library at all. It is just a collection for components too small to be called libraries in their own right.

But that doesn't mean there isn't useful stuff here. Take a look:

addressof
assert
base_from_member
BOOST_BINARY
call_traits
checked_delete
compressed_pair
current_function
declval
enable_if
in_place_factory
iterator_adaptors
generator iterator adaptors
next/prior
noncopyable
operators
result_of
swap
throw_exception
utility
string_ref
value_init BOOST_EXPLICIT_OPERATOR_BOOL and BOOST_CONSTEXPR_EXPLICIT_OPERATOR_BOOL
